{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Razer |model=Sila |revision=(RZ37-0251) |series=AC3000 |price=250 |est_release_date=10/02/2018 |fcc_date=10/03/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTQ-334ACN |manuf_rev=V04 |type=wireless router, wireless system |fcc_id=RWO-RZ370251 |ic_id=8092D-RZ370251 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7187VQ, E071800; |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu2_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A, PE712T5N, 1712, TAIWAN; |cpu2_cspeed=650 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L12845EZNI-10G |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W971GG6SB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7187VQ, E071800; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7187VQ, E071800; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NE646RTP, E064600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85736-11;85736-11, 999947.1, 1717 MX;2;,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 6417T4;1;,,, 1x1 Zero Wait DFS Monitor Radio;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9887;QCA9887, 0VV, PK727WMM, K072702;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth, Multi-Channel Zero Wait DFS, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] backhaul (80MHz chan.), :• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] clients (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] clients (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Sila Gaming Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.razer.com/desktops-and-networking/razer-sila}} "WRTQ-334ACN_V04" and "ESQ-S15-0905R RoHS" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|IGNITION Design Labs Portal}} ===News=== *[https://press.razer.com/press-releases/razer-launches-the-fastest-gaming-grade-wifi-router-for-pc-console-and-mobile/ ''Razer launches the fastest gaming grade wifi router for PC, Console and Mobile'' on '''Razer'''] *[https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2018/10/2/17928752/razer-sila-gaming-router-wifi-mesh-networking-pricing-release-date ''Razer’s new gaming router offers more reliable Wi-Fi and mesh networking'' on '''The Verge'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2018/10/02/razer-gaming-router-sila-low-latency/ ''Razer claims Sila is the fastest gaming router you can buy'' on '''EnGadget'''] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/razer-debuts-gaming-router.49146/ ''Razer Debuts Gaming Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Wireless Systems]]
